text: Hamish Linklater (born July 7, 1976) is an American actor and comedian, best known for playing Matthew in The New Adventures of Old Christine. ==Early life== Linklater was born and raised in Great Barrington, Massachusetts on July 7, 1976, to Scottish Kristin Linklater, Professor of Theatre and Chair of the Acting Division at Columbia University and a renowned teacher of vocal technique, and Jim Cormeny. ==Other websites== * * Hamish Linklater at TV.com Category:1976 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Massachusetts Category:Comedians from Massachusetts Category:American movie actors Category:American stage actors Category:American television actors
title: Hamish Linklater
